message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my financial constraints.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $17500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $17500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. I'm confident that's a fair price considering the market value and my financial constraints.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16250. This is as low as I can go, and I'm confident it's still a great value for the product's quality and uniqueness.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. Can you meet me at $16000?
